main.name: Gerard Torrent
main.description: Hey you all! Welcome to my website
main.bio: I'm an economist that I become a data guy. My interest are related to all data sector and normally I research data related to public policies, urbanism, mobility and transportation. Also, I do a lot of work related to accounting and business development on NGOs. Sometimes, I try to create art with my computer
main.contactmessage: Feel free to send me a message!

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of my hard skills

education.description: Focused in Econometrics, Industrial Organization, Public policies and Business Development. Final Project: Introduction to Blue Economy: Study Cases
One year studying abroad, focused on Public policies, Econometrics and Urbanism.

education.degree: Master in Science and Technology of Sustainability
education.description: Focused in Industrial Organization, Public Policies, Urbanism, Complex Networks and Data Mining. Final Project: Analysis of Participation Policies of Terrassa

work.title: All in one man
work.description: I started as a delivery guy, then I work as waitress and sushi man. My main functions where related to serve and to manage stocks and help with supplier orders.

work.title: Accounting and Operations
work.description: Helping in the Operative  and Accounting departments. Improving the deliveries and special offers and the reducing costs. Also, I had been creating all the data sheets and scripts using VBA.

work.title: QA Automation
work.description: Being part of the foundation of the QA Automation Department. Creating QA and RPA applications with Java.

work.title: QA Engineer
work.description: Being part of the foundation of the QA Chapter. Testing all the components of the mobility applications with different tools.

work.title: Data Engineer
work.description: Being part of the project DPP

skills.name: Programming Languages
skills.level:
My first programming language is Java and is the one that I more capable.
During my first years as a professional I learned VBA and I still use it for some projects related to business accounting and administration.
Of course, for all my data projects I try to use Python as I have a knowledge base of R related to my academic studies.
Finally, I'm constantly checking new libraries, frameworks or different languages so I try to be updated.

skills.name: Data Bases
skills.level:
Majority of time I have been working with relational data bases and I have been working normally with MySQL and also with PostgreSQL.

 For my last projects I have been working with MongoDB.

skills.name: Data Visualization
skills.level: Normally I use Python and libraries as Matplotlib, ggplot or Seaborn to visualize data but, also, I have been working with some data software as Amplitude, Amazon Quicksight and Tableau.

skills.name: Cloud Computing
skills.level: I have been working with  Amazon Web Service since I started working on Seat:Code there I learned all the technology offered by Amazon and I have been doing personal projects and courses to improve the knowledge.

projects.title: Mobility Data Bcn
projects.category: Repository with all my analysis related to Mobility of Barcelona
